CustomField.description:
In case Lightning Action Group is created with Lightning Action Group Conditions. Please select the option to show Lightning Actions from this group.
All - All Conditions must be TRUE. Any - Any Conditions is TRUE. Custom - Custom Boolean Expression, like (#1 AND #3) OR (#2 AND #4)
Supported Boolean Functions: AND, OR, NOT, XOR
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Criteria for Lightning Action Condition Evaluation.
All - All Conditions must be TRUE. Any - Any Conditions is TRUE. Custom - Expression built in form of #ConditionIndex, like (#1 AND #3) OR (#2 AND #4)
CustomField.label: Conditions Met
